1.0.name: wordpress/heyzap-games
1.0.description:
The newly launched Heyzap.com now has a Wordress plugin. Put more than 6000+ of the Internet's most addictive, fun games on your blog.

You get * Get the power of games: 6000+ of the most addictive casual games * Super fresh; Get endless, vibrant content updated regularly * Increase blog traffic and stickiness!

Has a few options * Add games to your side bar * Add games to teh end of your blog * Add embed key to track game plays on your site.

Author URI: http://www.heyzap.com Plugin URI: http://www.heyzap.com/publishers/wordpress
